title: "Study indicates proton therapy has less side effects in prostate cancer treatment"
excerpt: "The results from a pilot study on a small group of high-risk prostate cancer patients by Apollo Proton Cancer Centre (APCC) indicate that the proton therapy could significantly reduce side effects compared to conventional radiation therapy."
